name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Adam CUNNINGHAM, Appellee

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Adam CUNNINGHAM, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The petition for allowance of appeal having been improvidently granted, the appeal is dismissed.
MANDERINO, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert A. Selig, Asst. Dist. Atty., Montgomery Co., Mary MacNeil Killinger, Asst. Dist. Atty., Norristown, for appellant.
George B. Ditter, Ronald F. O’Driscoll, Norristown, Montgomery Co., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
407 A.2d 1306
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Adam CUNNINGHAM, Appellee.
Supremo Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 26, 1979.
Robert A. Selig, Asst. Dist. Atty., Montgomery Co., Mary MacNeil Killinger, Asst. Dist. Atty., Norristown, for appellant.
George B. Ditter, Ronald F. O’Driscoll, Norristown, Montgomery Co., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
